title: Curried Sweet Potato Chips Recipe
full_text:
Curried Sweet Potato Chips Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
4
to 6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Canola oil
1
large
sweet potato
, extremely thinly sliced on a mandoline
1
teaspoon
kosher salt
3/4
teaspoon
curry powder
Directions
Heat 2 inches of oil in a high-sided cast iron skillet to 350° degrees F. Fry the potato chips in batches until golden, about 90 seconds. Drain on paper towel.
Mix together the salt and curry powder. While the potato chips are still hot, season with the curry salt. Serve right away.
Snacks & Appetizers
Fried Potatoes
Sweet Potatoes
